articles.title: Opinion: Herschel Walker can't win Georgia Senate seat because of football ties, but he can win
articles.description: Herschel Walker is running for Senate in Georgia. In a normal world, he'd have no shot. But in this divided country, he has a fighting chance.
articles.content: Herschel Walker, the alleged domestic abusing, Russian roulette playing, not-so-great businessman announced on Tuesday his campaign for U.S. Senate in Georgia. Can the former Bulldog and NFL star run… [+4851 chars]

articles.title: How UFL is Aiming to Compete with FIFA and eFootball - IGN
articles.description: It’s not very often that a new football game comes along, never mind one with the avowed intentions of wrestling the dominance away from the historically huge duo of FIFA and PES (now eFootball). Here's how UFL is planning to do it.
articles.content: Among the dozens of announcements and reveals at Gamescoms Opening Night Live, the newly unveiled UFL is one that caught the eye in particular. Its not because of some stunning gameplay reveal we did… [+8312 chars]

articles.title: Luke Willson decides to 'walk away' after signing with Seattle Seahawks, citing heart issue
articles.description: Tight end Luke Willson, who had signed for a fourth stint with the Seahawks on Tuesday, says he is stepping away from football due to a heart condition and other health issues.
